ingredients.item: 400g pack Waitrose Frozen Fruits De Mer
Finely grated zest and juice of 1 orange

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and cook the celery and garlic
for 3â€“4 minutes until softened. Add the Flavour Pot and vegetable stock and bring to the boil.
Stir in the cannellini beans and frozen seafood mix and cook for
minutes until cooked through and piping hot.
Stir in the orange zest and juice and ladle the soup into wide bowls. Scatter with parsley and serve with crusty bread.
